amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding in the sewer overflow control grants section by 5 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds in the sewer overflow control grants section by 5 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. King (IA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
